Class GUIControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GUIControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GUIControl
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class Name: GUIControl Class Job: to create the GUI for the project and to hold some variables for internal calculations.
    Author:
    Rich Laptop
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculations

        private void calculations(java.lang.String humanGuess,
                          java.lang.String tempWTG)
        Method calculations takes in a human guess, and a word that is being guessed. it will check it with the previous incorrect guesses and correct guesses and see which it belongs to.
        Parameters:
        humanGuess - the humans inputted guess.
        tempWTG - the word that is trying to be guessed.
